name: pinry
description: Pinry is a self-hosted image pinboard app similar to Pinterest. It includes tagging, boards, and user profiles, ideal for organizing image collections or inspiration boards.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Save images from the web or upload directly to create visual collections

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Create boards to organize pins by theme, project, or category

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Apply tags to pins for additional categorization and searchability

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Customize profiles with avatars, bios, and public pin collections

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Display pins in a responsive masonry grid that adapts to different screen sizes

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Find pins by tags, descriptions, or board names across all collections
